channel.title: MolPhys II on Modulhandbuch Physik/Astronomie der Universität Bonn
channel.description: Recent content in MolPhys II on Modulhandbuch Physik/Astronomie der Universität Bonn

item.title: MolPhys II
item.description: Molecular Physics II - MolPhys II Course Molecular Physics II Course No. MolPhys II Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 3+1 6 ST Requirements: Preparation: Atomic Physics, Molecular Physics and Quantum Mechanics at the level of the bachelor courses in physics, Molecular Physics I Form of Testing and Examination: Oral Examination Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: In the second part of the core courses more complex issues of molecular spectra are introduced.
